text:
Boston, MA • ONSITE • JavaScript Engineer • Project Decibel (projectdecibel.com)

Project Decibel is looking for experienced JS engineers to help build some really crazy, ambitious stuff that we're not quite ready to talk about publicly. We're hiring both Front-End and Node.js engineers (or if you're full-stack, that's even better).

Ideal candidates will understand things like higher-order functions, prototypal inheritance, asynchronous programming, etc.

Please send resumes and a link to your Github to kevin@projectdecibel.com
